roleset.name: divide, distribute
roleset.note: DIVVY_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'divvy up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from divvy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: active, all args
example.text: [A previously available program called Network Computing System, developed by Hewlett-Packard's Apollo division]-1, for instance, takes a task and splits it up into parts, [*-1]divvying up those parts to several computers in a network for simultaneous processing.
example.arg: to several computers in a network

example.name: passive
example.text: [The amount]-1 of income divvied [*]-1 up for each man, woman and child was $16,489 in 1988, up 6.6% from $15,472 in 1987.
example.arg: for each man, woman and child
